DOC.brief_summary: Compare the incidence of ventilator associated pneumonia with or without tracheal isotonic saline instillation before tracheal suctioning
DOC.brief_title: Saline Instillation Before Tracheal Suctioning and the Incidence of Ventilator Associated Pneumonia
DOC.criteria: Consecutive patients foreseen to receive mechanical ventilation for more than 72 hours Previous mechanical ventilation in the last month Mechanical ventilation for more than 6 hours before arrival at ICU, Contraindication to bronchoscopy and Be expected to die or undergo withdrawal treatment within 48 hours
